input.sentences: i had a great time at the cemetery .
i went there to pay my respects .
there were a lot of gravestones .
i put flags in all of them .
it was a lot of work .
output.sentences: The confederate flag flew high over the cemetary.
The wind had picked up and the flag seemed to have a life of it's own.
How strange she thought to have a flag wave so vigorously over the gravestones of the dead.
Good southern men with shattered dreams and hopes.
Good southern men who stood the same ground as her great-grandfather.
